name: hafee-utility-plugin
description: WordPress plugin providing Google Drive integration and automated content maintenance workflows

scripts.package: npm run build && composer install --no-dev --optimize-autoloader && cd .. && zip -r hafee-utility-plugin.zip hafee-utility-plugin/ -x "hafee-utility-plugin/node_modules/*" -x "hafee-utility-plugin/.git/*" -x "hafee-utility-plugin/.github/*" -x "hafee-utility-plugin/.idea/*" -x "hafee-utility-plugin/.vscode/*" -x "hafee-utility-plugin/.DS_Store" && cd hafee-utility-plugin

author: Muhammad Hafee Imran
